item.title: Power BI/Tableau Report Generation and DBT Transformation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled freelancer who can assist us in generating reports using Power BI and Tableau, as well as performing DBT (Data Build Tool) transformations. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in data analytics and visualization, with proficiency in Power BI and Tableau. They should also be experienced in working with DBT to transform and optimize data for reporting purposes. The main responsibilities of this gig include creating visually appealing and interactive dashboards, designing and implementing data models, and ensuring data accuracy and integrity.   

Skills required:

- Power BI
- Tableau
- DBT
- Data analytics
- Data visualization
- Data modeling
- Data transformation

This gig is of medium size, with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate level expert who can deliver high-quality reports and meet project deadlines.

item.title: Power Bi Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Job Purpose:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Power BI Developer to join our dynamic team. The
ideal candidate will have 5-6 years of hands-on experience in Power BI, with a strong background in

data modelling and report development. The candidate should also have expertise in DAX and M-
language to effectively transform and present data in meaningful ways.

Responsibilities:
1. Develop, design, and maintain Power BI dashboards and reports.
2. Write and optimize DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) to create measures and calculated
columns.
3. Analyse existing reports from Tableau or SSRS reporting system and transform them into
Power BI.
4. Utilize M-language for advanced data transformations in Power BI.
5. Perform data analysis and provide insights to support decision-making processes.
6. Ensure data accuracy and consistency across various reports and dashboards.
7. Implement best practices for Power BI development and data visualization.
8. Working knowledge on Shared Data Model (Semantic Model) and Incremental Data Refresh
9. Perform Unit testing as part of Development process.
10. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power BI reports and data sources.
11. Provide training and support to end-users on Power BI functionalities and best practices.


Posted On: July 17, 2024 10:01 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Python, SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, Power Query, Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services, Microsoft Power Automate, Microsoft PowerApps, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, Databricks Platform, Apache Spark

item.title: ETL Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
BPK is among the top 5000 growing companies of 2022 in North America. We know that finding a meaningful and rewarding job can be a long journey. Our goal is to make that process as easy as possible for you and to create a work environment that's satisfying - one where you'll look forward to coming to every day. We provide an environment of growth and learning. We believe in employee empowerment, ownership, collaboration, and fun at work. BPK is working with the latest technologies in both service and product-based software development. We work with people who love technology and want to be hands-on, people who love taking ownership and accountability in whatever they do, and most importantly with people who are passionate about their work and skills. If that is you, we are the right organization.



Roles & Responsibilities:

Gather requirements and translate them into user stories that can be engineered and As the Data Developer, you will be primarily responsible for developing the full life cycle of an Enterprise Data solution (data movement and visualization), including requirements analysis, platform selection, technical architecture design, application design and development, testing, and Test and Deployment in a Cloud based environment. The position will focus on building out a consumer insights strategy and building advanced analytics to deliver capabilities against that strategy using industry best practices meeting functional, non-functional and performance related requirements.



ETL + Power BI Developer

Job Descriptions:

DWH + BI experience of 5-7 years
Excellent SQL, Stored procedure & Database Knowledge in AZURE/MS SQL Server - 4+ yrs
Extensive SQL query for Data Analysis
Should have created simple to complex SQL Stored procedures for functional requirements
Experience in ETL SSIS/AZURE DF - 3 yrs+
Designed & developed ETL jobs, pipelines in SSIS/ADF
Should have extensive knowledge in execution of pipelines, monitoring and issue resolution.
·       Responsible for managing and working primarily on Microsoft Azure technologies Azure Data Factory, Azure SQL DW, Analysis Services innovative Microsoft Web application.



Experience in Data Visualization in Power BI - 3yrs+
Should have created simple to complex reports with drill-down/drill-up capabilities
Should have experience in usage of various chart, table/grid objects
Developed various dashboards for daily reports, MTD, YTD reports
Generated dashboards by joining multiple complex tables
Expose data to end users using Power BI, Azure API Apps or other modern visualization platform or experience.
Communication Skills – A fair combination of written and verbal English is a must as we are serving US based clients.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$8.00
Posted On: July 17, 2024 06:39 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, ETL, Data Analysis
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, ETL, Data Analysis
Country: United States

item.title: Data Analyst - Raw Data Cleaning and Segregation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Data Analyst to clean raw data and segregate it according to specific categories. You will be responsible for organizing and transforming data into structured formats that can be easily analyzed. The ideal candidate has a strong attention to detail and experience working with large datasets. This is a critical role in ensuring data accuracy and integrity for further analysis.
    

Responsibilities:
    - Clean and preprocess raw data to remove errors, duplicates, and inconsistencies
    - Categorize and tag data based on given criteria
    - Ensure data quality and integrity through validation and data cleansing techniques
    - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver actionable insights
    

Requirements:
    - Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role
    - Proficient in data cleaning techniques and tools
    - Strong knowledge of Excel, SQL, and statistical analysis software
    - Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
    - Attention to detail and problem-solving skills
    - Excellent communication and teamwork abilities
    

We are looking for a candidate who can start immediately and work on a full-time basis. This is a remote position with flexible working hours. If you have the required skills and are passionate about working with data, we would love to hear from you!

Budget: $50
Posted On: July 17, 2024 09:13 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, R, Data Science, Statistics
Skills: Data Analysis, Microsoft Excel, R, Data Science, Statistics
Country: India

item.title: Power BI Expert | Data Engineer | Programmer Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an analyst on a part-time or full-time basis who can work many hours a week depending on availability and skillset (any time zone is fine)

You will be required to log on remotely to complete certain tasks. Time is required or we can switch to a per-milestone contract

MUST HAVE HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION and at least 16GB Of RAM on the computer. Microsoft PowerBI installed

MUST BE WILLING TO VALIDATE WORK, it is not enough to write a formula and hope for the best

Looking for an experienced analyst
Examples of tasks:
-Create a report from SQL DB (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle, Snowflake)
-Finding insights and drawing conclusions
- Statistical analysis using JMP|SAS|
- Advanced knowledge of Python| R
-Creating reports or dashboards in PowerBI or PowerPoint
-Asking questions, and figuring out answers to problems by being proactive



NOT LOOKING FOR A DEVELOPER who JUST FOLLOWS ORDERS looking for someone who can provide solutions and ASK QUESTIONS.


40% of the time is spent analyzing data. It is not enough to create a measure or show a chart must dig into the data. What is the data telling us? these fields are blank is this ok? so many nulls is this right? etc.

40% asking the right questions in order to comprehend and create the business intelligence report. being innovative and condensing disparate pieces of data into actionable insights or succinct reports for senior executives. Proficient with PowerBI, Mcode, and DAX

20 % documentation to help translate business requirements to technical requirements

-Use current and emerging Statistics, Machine Learning and Data Science methods
Innovate new analytic solutions that serve unmet customer needs
communicate analytical results clearly and succinctly-
-Work closely with me to make value-added analytical services available to stakeholders
-Be creative, collaborative in nature, and a self-starter

Must have:
PowerBI
SQL (CTE's, window functions, etc)
Understanding of statistics using R or Python
Some knowledge of statistical viz packages such as JMP, SAS



Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00

Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Machine Learning, Salesforce, Finance, Tableau, R, Microsoft PowerApps

item.title: QlikView to Tableau Report Migration - Upwork
item.description:

item.title: Power BI - Show me How Integrate Boolean Logic for End User to Generate Table Contents - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,
I am relatively new to PowerBI. I am helping my hospital make an interface to interact with patient data for medical studies. I want the end user to be able to use Boolean logic to generate a table that they can export. The user should use a slicer/filter to create a selection of studies that is shown on a Table/Matrix Table. It should allow user to do something like: show studies that had [(Parameter1 = Blue or Red, but not yellow) AND (Parameter2 = Medium or Large) ] OR [(Parameter1 = Green) AND (Parameter3 contains "heart" OR "kidney")]. Then the user can select which columns are shown in the table.  Note, there are currently 2200 parameters (I am happy to do the manual work of making individual slicers if needed.).  The approach should be very visually simple such that someone who doesn't know anything about PowerBI can find the right buttons easily to accomplish this.   I am hoping to pay an expert by the hour to show me how to accomplish this, using off the shelf or add in options in PowerBI.  Thank you.

item.title: Principal Power Platform Developer - Upwork
item.description:
Company Overview:
We are a dynamic and growing technology consulting and implementation firm specializing in helping automate back-office tasks using cutting-edge automation and integration solutions. Our work environment fosters growth and fulfillment, emphasizing values, impactful work, and autonomy.

Job Description:
We are seeking an expert-level Power Platform Developer to join our team on a contract basis. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience with the Microsoft Power Platform and will be capable of taking on complex tasks independently, providing innovative solutions, and contributing significantly to our projects. This role requires a self-starter who can work effectively in a small team environment and deliver high-quality results.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and implement Power Platform solutions (Power Apps, Power Automate) to meet business requirements.
- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand and analyze business needs, translating them into technical requirements and solutions.
- Develop custom connectors and integrations with various data sources, including but not limited to SharePoint, Dynamics 365, SQL Server, and third-party APIs.
- Create and maintain detailed documentation of solutions, including architecture, design, and user guides.
- Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Power Platform solutions, providing timely support and maintenance.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest features and updates in the Power Platform, leveraging new capabilities to enhance solutions.
- Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and ensuring adherence to best practices.
- Mentor and guide junior developers, sharing knowledge and expertise to foster a collaborative team environment.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Power Platform Developer with a strong portfolio of successful projects.
- Expert-level proficiency in Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI, and Power Virtual Agents.
- Strong understanding of Power Platform architecture, connectors, and integration capabilities.
- Proficiency in developing custom connectors and integrating with various data sources.
- Solid experience with Microsoft 365, SharePoint, Dynamics 365, and Azure services.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
- Strong communication skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
- Relevant certifications in Power Platform (e.g., Microsoft Certified: Power Platform Developer Associate) are a plus.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD and source control.
- Familiarity with Agile methodologies and project management tools.
- Knowledge of other Microsoft technologies, such as .NET, C#, and SQL Server.

Availability:
Must be available to work 20 - 40 hours per week. Flexibility to accommodate meetings and collaboration across different time zones as needed. Must be in US based time-zone.

Why Join Us:
- Work on exciting and impactful projects that drive real business value.
- Collaborate with a passionate and talented team of professionals.
- Enjoy the flexibility of a remote work environment.
- Opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of a dynamic startup.


Hourly Range: $40.00-$90.00

item.title: Data Analyst for Customer Churn Prediction and Retention Strategy - Upwork
item.description:
We're seeking a skilled Data Analyst to help us understand and reduce our customer churn rate, as well as develop data-driven retention strategies.

Required Skills and Experience:
Strong proficiency in Python and R for data analysis
Expertise in SQL for complex data querying
Experience with data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
Familiarity with statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
Knowledge of machine learning techniques, particularly in the context of customer behavior prediction
Experience working with large datasets and cloud-based data warehouses (preferably BigQuery or Redshift)
Strong communication skills to present findings to non-technical stakeholders

Project Scope:
Data Exploration and Preparation:
Analyze our customer data, including usage patterns, support interactions, and subscription history
Clean and preprocess data from multiple sources
Identify key features that may influence customer churn


Churn Analysis and Prediction:
Develop a churn prediction model using appropriate machine learning algorithms
Identify the most significant factors contributing to customer churn
Create a system to score current customers based on their likelihood to churn

Retention Strategy Development:
Segment customers based on behavior and churn risk
Analyze the effectiveness of past retention efforts
Propose data-driven strategies for improving customer retention


Reporting and Visualization:
Create an interactive dashboard for real-time monitoring of churn metrics
Develop regular reports for different departments (Sales, Customer Success, Product)
Prepare compelling visualizations to communicate insights to the management team

A/B Testing Framework:
Design an A/B testing framework to evaluate the effectiveness of retention strategies
Analyze test results and provide recommendations for scaling successful initiatives

We're looking for a proactive and curious data analyst who can go beyond just crunching numbers to provide actionable insights.
This project is expected to last 3-4 months, with the potential for an ongoing consulting relationship. We're open to different working arrangements, including part-time or full-time dedication during the project period.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$45.00

Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Python, SQL, Tableau, Microsoft Power BI, R
Skills: Python, SQL, Tableau, Microsoft Power BI, R

item.description:
We are seeking a Power BI Specialist responsible for analyzing, cleaning, and segmenting sales pipeline data from multiple sources into a unified and clean file.

- Export clean and segmented data into standardized formats for further use and distribution.

item.title: Fractional CTO or CIO Needed for AI and Automation Projects - Upwork
item.description:
Title: Fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) / Chief Information Officer (CIO) for AI and Automation

Description:

We are a dynamic and growing law firm seeking a highly skilled fractional Chief Technology Officer (CTO) or Chief Information Officer (CIO) to lead our AI and automation projects. This role involves developing AI strategies, creating AI bots, building custom CRM systems, and enhancing our data analytics capabilities. We are looking for someone with a strategic vision, strong technical skills, and excellent leadership abilities.

Expectations and Deliverables:

AI Strategy and Implementation: Develop and execute a comprehensive AI strategy and roadmap.
AI Bots and NLP Systems: Create and deploy AI bots capable of interacting with potential and current clients via web, social media, text, and email, utilizing natural language processing.
Custom CRM System: Design, build, and integrate AI-driven features into a custom CRM system to enhance client and staff interaction.
Data Analytics Solutions: Develop advanced analytics solutions to track and improve staff performance and client engagement.
Mobile Application Development: Develop and deploy a mobile application with integrated AI features for enhanced client engagement.
Required Skills:

Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning:
Expertise in AI and machine learning, particularly in NLP and automation.
Proficiency with TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, and similar tools.
Software Development & Integration:
Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., Python, Java), full-stack development, and API integration.
Experience with DevOps practices and microservices architecture.
Data Analytics & Business Intelligence:
Experience with data analysis tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau), SQL, and data visualization.
Knowledge of ETL processes and data warehousing.
Cloud Computing & Infrastructure Management:
Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure), DevOps practices, and infrastructure automation tools.
Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform.
Project Management & Leadership:
Project management experience (e.g., PMP certification), team leadership, strategic planning, and excellent communication skills.
Ability to manage cross-functional teams and align technology initiatives with business goals.
Good Communication:

We value clear and prompt communication.
Regular updates on project progress and milestones.
Open to feedback and collaborative problem-solving.
Ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Work Style:

We prefer a collaborative and transparent work environment.
Flexibility to work remotely with occasional check-ins and meetings.
Ability to work independently and take initiative.
Regular interaction with our team to ensure alignment with business goals and project requirements.
Adherence to deadlines and delivering high-quality work.
Why Join Us?

Opportunity to lead and innovate in a dynamic and growing firm.
Work on exciting projects that leverage cutting-edge technology.
Flexible work arrangements with the ability to make a significant impact.
How to Apply:

Please provide your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience.
Include examples of previous AI and automation projects you have led.
Specify your availability and preferred working hours.
Budget: Competitive, based on experience and expertise.

Join us and be a part of a forward-thinking team dedicated to innovation and excellence in the legal industry. Apply now to lead our technological transformation!

We are looking to fill a fulltime position with an experienced Tableau and Power BI developer.
The applicant must have good communication skills in English, be proactive, and a team-player and at least 5 years of experience.

- Develop, test and deploy across multiple platforms (Cloud, On-Premise) and tools (database, reporting, analysis, visualization).
- Integration with different databases.
- Integration with external software.
- SAP tables knowledge.
